title: 3 Major Ways Web3 Will Disrupt The Financial Services Sector
author: Bernard Marr
description: Discover how Web3, powered by blockchain, NFTs, and cryptocurrency, is poised to revolutionize the financial landscape offering a more decentralized, and equitable future

title: The 10 Biggest Fintech Companies In America 2022
author: Isabel Contreras
description: Fintech’s mightiest privately owned companies continued to grow over the past year, but declining investment in the industry signals stormy waters ahead.

title: How Mastercard, Goldman Sachs And Other “TradFi” Titans Are Using Blockchain To Rewire Global Finance
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Crypto is in crisis, but many of the world’s biggest financial institutions are still banking on the underlying tech as the best way to build confidence with customers—and with one another.

title: TaxBit CEO Austin Woodword Steps Down, COO Lindsey Argalas Tapped As Successor
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: The former COO ascends to the chief executive role as the company looks to expand internationally.

title: Follow The Yellow BRIC Road (To A New Digital Reserve Currency?)
author: David G.W. Birch
description: Monetary commentator Charlie Crowson recently said that what is perhaps surprising is not that the classical gold standard ended but that it lasted as long as it did. When it comes to digital gold, I think tokens are great but that does not mean there will be a digital gold standard.

title: Spain’s Largest Bank Begins Educational Series On Bitcoin, Digital Assets
author: Mickey Koss
description: Santander’s new found interest may signal shifting sentiment towards bitcoin and may be an indication of increased institutional demand.

title: Russia’s Sberbank Moves Into DeFi, Following Slow-Moving Trend Of Traditional Banks
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: Here’s how Sberbank in Russia, and banks like Brazil’s Itau, are approaching the crypto economy.

title: Goldman Sachs Is Not Crypto’s White Knight
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Report that Wall Street heavyweight plans `tens of millions’ of dollars of investments in distressed digital assets gives wrong impression, source familiar with the firm says.

title: CryptoDad, CryptoCats And CryptoCash: Show Me The Identity
author: David G.W. Birch
description: The way forward is to make tokens work within a regulated environment where transactions are private but not anonymous. Secure against unreasonable search and seizure, but subject to reasonable search and seizure.
